special_abilities.name: False Appearance
special_abilities.desc: . While the blight remains motionless, it is indistinguishable from a dead shrub.

actions.name: Claws
actions.desc: . Melee Weapon Attack: +3 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. Hit: 3 (1d4 + 1) piercing damage.

name: Twig Blight
senses: blindsight 60 ft. (blind beyond this radius), passive Perception 9
